data.text:
Not to be confused with Halle Bailey.

Halle Maria Berry, born Maria Halle Berry, is an American actress, producer, director, and former fashion model, who is best known for her roles as Storm in the first three X-Men films and X-Men: Days of Future Past and Giacinta "Jinx" Johnson in the 2002 James Bond film Die Another Day. She also played Patience Phillips/Catwoman in the 2004 Warner Bros. film of the same name. Additionally, she starred in other films, such as Boomerang, The Flintstones, Monster's Ball, Gothika, Cloud Atlas, The Call, Kingsman: The Golden Circle, and John Wick: Chapter 3 â€“ Parabellum. She also voiced Cappy in the 2005 Blue Sky Studios film Robots.

For Disney, she portrayed Kathleen Mercer in the 1993 Hollywood Pictures film Father Hood, Autumn Haley in the 1993 Touchstone Pictures film The Program, and Josie Potenza in the 1996 Hollywood Pictures film The Rich Man's Wife. She was also an inspiration for Esmeralda in the 1996 Disney animated feature film The Hunchback of Notre Dame.

Trivia[]

She was considered for the role of Tina Turner in the 1993 Touchstone Pictures film What's Love Got to Do with It, before Angela Bassett was cast.[citation needed]
